description: This file defines a mock class ServiceMock for unit testing, implementing interfaces for a service shell in WPEFramework, using Google Mock to mock method behavior.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class for WPEFramework service shell interfaces, used for testing interactions with service components.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string of the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign identifying the service.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix URL for the service.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Returns the configuration line string.

methods.name: PersistentPath
methods.description: Returns the persistent storage path.

methods.name: VolatilePath
methods.description: Returns the volatile storage path.

methods.name: DataPath
methods.description: Returns the data storage path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if the service supports a specific feature identified by a byte.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with specified parameters.

methods.name: DisableWebServer
methods.description: Disables the web server.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns subsystems associated with the service.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request or task identified by a uint32_t with parameters.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with specific string parameters.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface by call sign and an identifier.

methods.name: Register (notification)
methods.description: Registers a notification handler.

methods.name: Unregister (notification)
methods.description: Unregisters a notification handler.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Returns the model identifier of the service.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates if the service runs in background.

methods.name: Accessor
methods.description: Returns an accessor string.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns the path to proxy stubs.

methods.name: HashKey
methods.description: Returns a hash key string.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Performs string substitution.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason code.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason code.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the current reason code.

methods.name: ConfigLine (with string argument)
methods.description: Sets or retrieves configuration line.

methods.name: SystemRootPath
methods.description: Returns the system root path.

methods.name: SystemPath
methods.description: Returns the system path.

methods.name: PluginPath
methods.description: Returns the plugin path.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns or sets the start mode.

methods.name: Resumed (with bool argument)
methods.description: Sets the resumed state of the service.

methods.name: Metadata
methods.description: Returns metadata information.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernates the service with a reason code.

methods.name: Register (IRemoteConnection)
methods.description: Registers remote connection notifications.

methods.name: Unregister (IRemoteConnection)
methods.description: Unregisters remote connection notifications.

methods.name: Register (ICOMLink notification)
methods.description: Registers a ICOMLink notification handler.

methods.name: Unregister (ICOMLink notification)
methods.description: Unregisters a ICOMLink notification handler.

methods.name: RemoteConnection
methods.description: Returns a remote connection object for a given ID.

methods.name: Instantiate
methods.description: Creates an instance of a remote object.

methods.name: GetLibrarySearchPaths
methods.description: Returns search paths for libraries.
